content:
From: Olga Vovk <ovovk@samvit-solutions.com>
Dear all,
I have a question, I need to find a good place to capture specimen description and other possible relevant specimen information (as a text).
Would Specimen.note(Annotation) be a good place to capture it?

Or I need better to use some other attribute/resource(s)?
Thank you!!!

Olga Vovk
<:3)))~~~~
yes- that's where I would put those kind of things, as long as text is sufficient.
